column3: <!--5d09a71f8925f3f132321140b44b946d-->The last travis run for this pull request was 80 days ago and is thus outdated. To trigger a fresh travis build, this pull request should be closed and re-opened.

Tested ACK 37efe5b7ea059e56d8f5170c91e3160db286cad4

To test:

```
$ bitcoind -regtest -daemon
$ cd ~/.bitcoin/regtest
$ mv debug.log{,.old}
$ touch debug.log; chmod 400 debug.log
$ killall -HUP bitcoind
$ bitcoin-cli -regtest savemempool
```

Current behaviour of master is that the "Dumped mempool" message (along with any other subsequent log messages) aren't logged to a
utACK 75ea00f391b742e435c650aae3e827aad913d552, good to get rid of the need of `freopen` I suppose
